meanings.definition: In a dreamy manner; as if lost in thought or fantasy.
meanings.sent1: She stared dreamily out the window, imagining faraway lands.
meanings.sent2: The girl smiled dreamily as she remembered her favorite childhood story.
meanings.sent3: He walked dreamily into a pole because he was too lost in his thoughts.
meanings.sent4: The music floated dreamily through the air, wrapping everyone in its enchanting melody.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the sunset blended dreamily, creating a magical painting in the sky.
